General.Name: Vadilal Industries Limited
General.Description: Vadilal Industries Limited manufactures and sells ice-creams in India and internationally. The company provides flavored milk, frozen dessert, processed foods, and other dairy products; and exports processed ice-creams, frozen fruits, vegetables, pulp, ready-to-eat and ready-to-serve products, etc., as well as paneer and ghee products. It also engages in money changing and chemical businesses. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.

2.Name: Mr. Kalpit Rajeshbhai Gandhi
2.Title: CFO and Non-Exec. & Non Independent Director
